title: Fact Check: This video of Muslims licking cutlery is NOT related to COVID-19 | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A video is being shared on social media with a claim that Muslims in Bihar are intentionally putting their saliva on cutlery and utensils to spread Coronavirus.

“14 china Muslims hidden at Bihari mosque has been taken to corona virus test by Bihari police.

 Erode police has caught Thailand Muslim mullahs infected with corona virus.

 Today Salem Police has caught 11 Indonesian Muslim mullahs at Salem mosque.

 This video shows that they are applying and putting saliva on spoons, plates and utensils and also they are in the intention of spreading corona virus disease.

 Nobody knows what’s happening in the Nation. received via wattsup, ” the caption read.

ALSO READ: Fact Check: Old video from Azerbaijan re-shared as lockdown in Spain

NewsMobile fact-checked the video and found that it is OLD.

We extracted the keyframes of the video and put it through Reverse Image Search. We found the same video on Vimeo uploaded on July 31, 2018.

Video depicting crazy behaviors of gullible plate, bowels, spoons licking Bohrasplate-licking Bohras 2 from Asghar Vasanwala on Vimeo.

As per the description, the video is of the Bohra community. The description also states that in Bohra culture, they believe in ‘not wasting even a single grain of food’ and hence were licking the cutlery.

We also found an article by The Outlook, featuring an image, where people can be seen sitting in a similar fashion, in similar attire, eating from a thali.

Even though NewsMobile couldn’t independently verify the origin of the video, it can safely be said that the video is OLD and is not related to COVID-19.
